mapper.update: update tbl_registered set r_date = #{rDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, r_department = #{rDepartment,jdbcType=CHAR}, r_price = #{rPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=CHAR}, p_phone = #{pPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, p_name = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_type = #{pType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_breed = #{pBreed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=CHAR}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=CHAR} where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select rid, r_date, r_department, r_price, pid, p_phone, p_name, p_type, p_breed, eid, doctor from tbl_registered where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select rid, r_date, r_department, r_price, pid, p_phone, p_name, p_type, p_breed, eid, doctor from tbl_registered
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_registered(rid, r_date, r_department, r_price, pid, p_phone, p_name, p_type, p_breed, eid, doctor) VALUES(#{rid},#{rDate},#{rDepartment},#{rPrice},#{pid},#{pPhone},#{pName},#{pType},#{pBreed},#{eid},#{doctor})
mapper.select: SELECT rid, r_date, r_department, r_price, pid, p_phone, p_name, p_type, p_breed, eid, doctor FROM tbl_registered WHERE rid=#{id}

SELECT r.rid, r.r_date, d1.value r_department, r.r_price, po.p_user_name pid, r.p_phone, r.p_name, d2.value p_type, r.p_breed, e.e_name eid, e2.e_name doctor FROM tbl_registered r JOIN tbl_pet_owner po ON po.pid=r.pid JOIN tbl_dic_value d1 ON d1.id=r.r_department LEFT JOIN tbl_dic_value d2 ON d2.id=r.p_type JOIN tbl_employee e ON e.eid=r.eid JOIN tbl_employee e2 ON e2.eid=r.doctor WHERE r.rid=#{id}

SELECT r.rid, r.r_date, r.r_department, r.r_price, p.p_user_name pid, r.p_phone, r.p_name, d1.value p_type, d2.value p_breed, r.eid, r.doctor FROM tbl_registered r JOIN tbl_pet_owner p ON p.pid=r.pid JOIN tbl_dic_value d1 ON d1.id=r.p_type JOIN tbl_dic_value d2 ON d2.id=r.p_breed
r.p_phone LIKE '%' #{phone} '%'
